Transform your new tab into an efficient working area, add to-do list, and organize bookmarks.
Introduce a revolutionary chrome extension that will entirely revamp your new tab experience!
Our extension enables you to personalize your start page with widgets such as top sport news, to-do list and clock, all in one user-friendly location.

By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing 'Games Day' - Chrome™ extension and setting Chrome™ New Tab to that provided by the service and the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.

Terms of Use: https://games-day.com/term-of-use.html
Contact Us: https://games-day.com/contact.html

Features:
-Custom Search: conduct your search with your chosen search engine. Select your go-to source for answers from top options such as Bing, Yahoo, or Google with a single click.
-Quick access to Chrome utilities
Easily access your browser's bookmarks, history, and downloads within one click.
-Switch to dark mode by changing your theme and update your background.

The extension will update your new tab settings and will change your search.

Permissions Requested :
Replace the page you see when opening a new tab - In order to provide the extension feature, your new tab settings would be modified.
Read and change your data on games-day.com - For our product to work, we require access to the websites we own and manage.
Read and change your bookmarks - For our product to work, we require access to save new bookmarks.
